response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product is not just a tool; it's a game-changer that can significantly enhance efficiency, productivity, and user experience. We believe in its immense value and potential impact, which is why we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you.

We are offering the product to you at an exceptional price of $850,000. This represents a significant discount compared to market rates, reflecting our confidence in its capabilities and your potential to maximize its benefits.

Please consider this offer carefully. We understand that decisions of this magnitude require thorough evaluation, and we are more than happy to provide any necessary information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. We are confident that once you experience the product, you'll appreciate its true worth.

Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this innovative solution to your organization.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
